import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"conversation-casanova---dave-perrotta"}}>{`Conversation Casanova - Dave Perrotta`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#conversation-casanova---dave-perrotta"}}>{`Conversation Casanova - Dave Perrotta`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#mindsets"}}>{`Mindsets`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#related-notes"}}>{`Related notes`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#impression-mistakes"}}>{`Impression mistakes`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#after-initiation"}}>{`After initiation`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#related-notes"}}>{`Related notes`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#teasing"}}>{`Teasing`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#related-notes"}}>{`Related notes`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#questions"}}>{`Questions`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#avoid"}}>{`Avoid`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#topics-for-conversations"}}>{`Topics for conversations`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#reference-to-self"}}>{`Reference to self`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#purpose-of-talking-about-yourself"}}>{`Purpose of talking about yourself`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#how-to-talk-about-yourself"}}>{`How to talk about yourself`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#telling-stories"}}>{`Telling stories`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#simple-habits-for-personal-conversations"}}>{`Simple habits for personal conversations`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#lessons-to-avoid-with-relationships"}}>{`Lessons to avoid with relationships`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"mindsets"}}>{`Mindsets`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Attraction towards you until proven otherwise.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`I am responsible for my life and circumstances.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`They're not there for validation, they are there for enrichment.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`I am enough. I don't need the approval of others to compete.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Individuals are not the #1 priority. You need mission and purpose outside.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`The discovery that a man can do what he is afraid to do (paraphrasing Henry Ford).`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Nervous excitement over nervous fear.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Subtlety, exagerration and becoming the prize`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"related-notes"}}>{`Related notes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`What excites you more? Experience the beauty, personality and passion or bragging about the score.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`"It is better by noble boldness to run the risk of being subject to half the evils we anticipate than to remain in cowardly listlessness for fear of what might happen." - Herodotus`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"impression-mistakes"}}>{`Impression mistakes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Talking too fast`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Speedy, anxious movements`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Looking too serious or too goofy`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Slouching`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Darting eyes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Talking with a high pitched voice`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"after-initiation"}}>{`After initiation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`They are in a rush`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`They have a few minutes to talk`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`They have time on their hands`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"related-notes-1"}}>{`Related notes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`"I know this is random and we just met, but you have an interesting vide. We should grab a drink this week or next." - Label before they can.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"teasing"}}>{`Teasing`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Stay away from physical features.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Fashion/style`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Social skills`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Intelligence`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Family`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"related-notes-2"}}>{`Related notes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Never understimate the power of touch.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"questions"}}>{`Questions`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Structure questions: short-answer, open-ended, open-ended (mix it up).`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Active listening. Mirror, reflect, isopraxism.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`The other vs. the same. You need similarities.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"avoid"}}>{`Avoid`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Stating contentious opinions. Be non-judgemental and focus on commonalities.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Getting married to a conversation topic. Weave into multiple topics.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Talking about yourself too much. Focus on the other.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"topics-for-conversations"}}>{`Topics for conversations`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Experiences`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Dreams`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`What they love to do`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Passions`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Motivations`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"reference-to-self"}}>{`Reference to self`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`No stats or facts. Connect only with emotions.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Don't give humble brags.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Don't be an open book straight away.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"purpose-of-talking-about-yourself"}}>{`Purpose of talking about yourself`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Excite and intrigue. Then turn the conversation back onto them.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`No to good job, money, looks. Yes to dominance, sociability, altruism.`}<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Dominance: know the abundance, go for what you want:`}<MDXTag name="ol" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Achieved something you thought impossible`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Took charge of a situation without knowing the outcome`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`A time you successfully led a group`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`"I love art, but everyone told you can never succeed in that profession. That only motivated me more to prove people wrong. Within a few months..."`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Sociability: The ability to bring them around friends and not creep them out. You're a cool, confident guy who can talk to anyone.`}<MDXTag name="ol" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Time you hung out with friends and had fun`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Time you connected to someone you looked up to`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Time you introduced two groups of friends to each other`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Altruistic: concerns about other people and their rights, feelings and welfare.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"how-to-talk-about-yourself"}}>{`How to talk about yourself`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Reciprocity`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`The open loop`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Don't make conversation about yourself`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Know your "hero story"`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Poke fun at your mistakes and the lessons learned`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"telling-stories"}}>{`Telling stories`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Tell the story as if you are reliving it`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`It should help you connect with others`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`It should showcase your attractive qualities`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Should be about something she's interested in`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`End with a bang`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"simple-habits-for-personal-conversations"}}>{`Simple habits for personal conversations`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Talk about something she is passionate about`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Why they decided to live in a particular city`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`What they like/dislike about their job`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`A place they have travelled to and why`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Music they are interested in`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`What their aspirations are`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Something they are excited about`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"lessons-to-avoid-with-relationships"}}>{`Lessons to avoid with relationships`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Bitterness - do not hold a grudge`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Inexperience - a struggle to understand others`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Subbornness - an inability to understand people are emotional and emotionally different`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Insecurity - pursuing for people to complete them`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
